===Etymology===
From: '''摸著石頭過河'''，[[走一步算一步]] '''''to feel the rocks (on the riverbed) as one crosses the river''', taking one step at a time''.

}}

===Idiom===
{{zh-idiom}}

# (''[[xiehouyu]]'') to figure things out as one goes; to take things one step at a time
